Here also
Phy出身

假如一條laplace equ in polar form剩係depends on r , provided that watertable/groundwater level is u(r,θ) for 0<=θ<2pie
assume steady flow,即係time independent

BC: u(a,θ) =h1
u(b,θ)=h2 b>a

me可否assume uθθ=0
將成條laplace equ變成urr +(1/r)ur =0

如果有人問phy我可以客串答下

首先我唔明你既P(A-B)係咩意思
我既思路係，條題目想你搵有其中一部野既機會但包括兩部一齊有既部份，咁我咪淨係將A同B唔intersect果part相加
如果再正式d既寫法可能係
[P(A)-P(AandB)]+[P(B)-P(BandA)]掛

如果我做呢，第一時間用佢比嘅條件搵番晒
P(M) P(t) P(M and t) P(No M and No P)
之後睇題目做汁番個ans出黎

例如c個題要搵有M有t但唔要M and t
其實姐係P(M) +P(t) -2*P(M and t)

點解係兩個呢? 係因為P(M) 同P(t) 都有P(M and t)呢舊嘢所以要減番兩次！

我打錯
C係問緊P(A U B)
咁轉返條式唔係應該
P(A)+P(B)-P(A and B)咩


呢條式係講解有a or 有b 嘅prob.
但你同時有a又有b 其實都符合有a/b 嘅個條式，所以計多左

1. 嚴格既證明要用 double integral
小學雞既想法
一個 cube 可以由中心切到 6 個 pyramid，
每個既 volume = x^3/6
Pyramid 個 base = x, height = x/2
Pyramid volume = 1/3*x^2*(x/2)

2. Double integral

3. Euclid 既 "Parallel postulate" 係等價 "Triangle Postulate"

4. e, pi 係 irrational 既 proof? Google 啦

5. Gauss "證明" 左 Fundamental Theorem of Algebra，證明有
好多方法，Google 啦

complex coeffiecient是咪指例如
(a+bi)x^2 +(c+di)x +(e+fi)=y
得唔得嫁?

得

Gauss 既 fundamental theorem of algebra 保證得
degree n 既 polynomial 有 n 個 root

成件事最癡線既係 polynomial of degree >= 5 唔一定可以寫到個 root 出黎，即係無似 quadratic formula 咁既 general formula

個 root 係存在，但係你唔一定可以 exactly 搵到

問簡單啲先
- 點解錐體體積要用柱體除3？
- 點解sphere surface area係4(pi)r^2
- 究竟係先有parallel lines properties (corr., alt., int.)定係先有angle sum of triangle？
- 上面嗰句一開始究竟點prove？
- 點解/點證pi同e係irrational？
- 點解話所有polynomials in complex coefficients都會有root？

雖然我嚟緊都考DSE，不過我唔介意你講深少少，因為我已經睇過唔少大學書

頭兩題:
direct computation of iterated integral / surface integral

第三四題: [認真 mode?]
你先由 Neutral geometry ge axioms 可以推斷 alternate interior angle theorem 然後再由 Saccheri-Legendre 可以推斷 angle sum <=180
再加 parallel axiom 可以證 angle sum = 180

pi , e can be shown to be transcendental using AL pure math definite integral tricks
[refer to Apostol for pi, Herstein for e]

最尾:
you can only assert root must exists in complex field
but not polynomial in complex coefficients must have root (if your working field is real number, then clearly x^2 = i gives no real root)
standard short proof
polynomial f is entire , consider 1/f
apply Liouville suitably / modulus principle

當然有唔同證法

C之後果d
係唔係有好多個case
因為果堆野放前放後都唔同


C:

treat all vowel as a group
P,R,F,S,S,N,L,{OEOAI} has 8!/2! placement
remaining is to permute {OEOAI} which has 5!/2! possible ways
so 8!/2! * 5!/2!

D:
{PRFSSNL} , {OEOAI} 2! placement
then followed by 7!/2! * 5!/2! ways

E:
treat the question with given word PROFEIONAL"

一堆散修修 ge consonants 同 一團 響音

C正路係唔係5! x 5! x 2! = 28800
但係答案係2880
係唔係因為圍圓少左組合

要除總人數

例子：
ABCD 圍圈，下面會當一樣

AB
DC

DA
CB

CD
BA

BC
AD

但係答案係2880

(3) 5! for the girls to be placed on the odd-number seats
